results.title: Determination of trace elements and electrolyte levels in kidney tissue of simvastatin-treated septic rats.
results.text_hl: As a result of examining the kidney tissues under a light microscope, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ improved @<m>DISEASE_Soft_Tissue_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017695 @@@tissue damage@@@ caused by @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@-induced @DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@acute kidney injury@@@.

citations.NLM: Ates G, Tamer S, Ozkok E, Yorulmaz H, Yalcin IE, Demir G. Determination of trace elements and electrolyte levels in kidney tissue of simvastatin-treated septic rats. Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol. 2023 Nov 15;():. PMID: 37966573

results.title: The protective effects of simvastatin in Cadmium-Induced preosteoblast injury through Nox4.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Cadmium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002104 @@@Cadmium@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Cadmium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002104 @@@Cd@@@) has a direct toxic effect on bones. Statins such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ have protective effects on various diseases, including on @<m>DISEASE_Soft_Tissue_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017695 @@@tissue injury@@@.

citations.NLM: Huang C, Liang D, Huang C, Li B, He J, Huang X. The protective effects of simvastatin in Cadmium-Induced preosteoblast injury through Nox4. J Recept Signal Transduct Res. 2022 Apr;42(2):117-124. PMID: 33349105

results.title: Simvastatin mitigates diabetic nephropathy by upregulating farnesoid X receptor and Nrf2/HO-1 signaling and attenuating oxidative stress and inflammation in rats.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ effectively ameliorated @DISEASE_Hyperglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@, @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@kidney hypertrophy@@@, body @DISEASE_Weight_Loss @DISEASE_MESH:D015431 @@@weight loss@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Soft_Tissue_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017695 @@@tissue injury and@@@ @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ animals.

results.title: Simvastatin and atorvastatin improve neurological outcome after experimental intracerebral hemorrhage.
results.text_hl: Significant improvement in neurological function was seen 2 to 4 weeks post-@DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@ICH@@@ with increased neurogenesis observed. CONCLUSIONS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ significantly improved neurological recovery, decreased @<m>DISEASE_Soft_Tissue_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017695 @@@tissue loss@@@, and increased neurogenesis when administered for 1 week after @DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@ICH@@@.

citations.NLM: Karki K, Knight RA, Han Y, Yang D, Zhang J, Ledbetter KA, Chopp M, Seyfried DM. Simvastatin and atorvastatin improve neurological outcome after experimental intracerebral hemorrhage. Stroke. 2009 Oct;40(10):3384-9. PMID: 19644071

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates cisplatin-induced kidney and liver damage in rats.
results.text_hl: This study aimed to investigate the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on the extent of @<m>DISEASE_Soft_Tissue_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017695 @@@tissue@@@ damage in @CHEMICAL_Cisplatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002945 @@@cisplatin@@@-induced nephrotoxicity and hepatotoxicity.

results.title: Simvastatin inhibits inflammation in ischemia-reperfusion injury.
results.text_hl: Our results suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ may be an effective protectant against @<m>DISEASE_Soft_Tissue_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017695 @@@tissue injury@@@ associated with I@DISEASE_Ring_Chromosome_20_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C580424 @@@/R

results.title: ATP-dependent potassium channels are implicated in simvastatin pretreatment-induced inhibition of apoptotic cell death after renal ischemia/reperfusion injury
results.text_hl: It also abolished the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Soft_Tissue_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017695 @@@tissue injury@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Malondialdehyde @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008315 @@@MDA@@@ contents and downregulated the @GENE_BAX @GENE_24887 @@@Bax@@@ protein after @DISEASE_HAIR_AN_syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C537629 @@@IR injury@@@ (p< 0.05).

results.title: Simvastatin decreases incidence of decompression sickness in rats.
results.text_hl: Previous studies suggested that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@) can protect against pathological @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Soft_Tissue_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017695 @@@tissue damage@@@.

results.title: Simvastatin decreases hepatic ischaemia/reperfusion-induced liver and lung injury in rats.
results.text_hl: Serum aminotransferase activity and LDH and @GENE_TNF @GENE_24835 @@@TNFalpha@@@ levels were increased markedly by hepatic I/R, and these were suppressed significantly by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. The @<m>DISEASE_Soft_Tissue_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017695 @@@tissue injury@@@ index and the number of apoptotic cells via TUNEL staining in the liver and lungs were higher in the I/R group than in the I/R + @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group.

citations.NLM: Dibazar F, Hajipour B, Hosseinian MM, Hemmati MR, Ghandiha A. Simvastatin decreases hepatic ischaemia/reperfusion-induced liver and lung injury in rats. Folia Morphol (Warsz). 2008 Nov;67(4):231-5. PMID: 19085860
